description:
Lately, Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with lots of snacks. Curious to know where she’s getting all the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi around for the day.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Chibi Chibi no Nazo!? Osawagase Daitsuiseki
Chibi-Chibi`s Mystery: The Big Noisy Chase
¿El misterio de Chibi-Chibi? Un gran ruido.
ちびちびの謎!? おさわがせ大追跡
